org.nd4j.jita.flow.impl

Class GridFlowController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nd4j.jita.flow.impl.SynchronousFlowController
      • org.nd4j.jita.flow.impl.GridFlowController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FlowController

    public class GridFlowController
extends SynchronousFlowController
    FlowController implementation suitable for CudaGridExecutioner Main difference here, is delayed execution support and forced execution trigger in special cases
